Module com.arcane.arithmetic
Package com.arcane.arithmetic

Class Fill_Question

java.lang.Object
com.arcane.arithmetic.Fill_Question
public class Fill_Question extends Object
Helper class to load fill-in-the-blank questions from the database. Mimics the form of the Json Object
Author:
Candice Williams
